title: New Creator: Steven Van Belleghem
body:
Name: Steven Van Belleghem

Socials: https://www.stevenvanbelleghem.com/
https://twitter.com/StevenVBe
https://www.linkedin.com/in/stevenvanbelleghem/?originalSubdomain=be

Info: International keynote speaker - Author - Entrepreneur.
Core topic: customer experience in a digital/AI driven world.  Steven is the author of multiple international bestselling books including ‘The Conversation Manager’, ‘When Digital Becomes Human’, ‘Customers the Day after Tomorrow’, ‘The Offer You Can’t Refuse’ and a technology thriller called Eternal.

Use Cases:
Integrate Creator Coin giveaways and transactional use into his speaking engagements, corporate clients, and community engagement/monetization on LinkedIn and Twitter.

Community Treasury Grant Tier: $1,000

A 'yes' will approve Steven with a $1,000 Community Treasury Gift Coin grant.

A 'no' will deny this proposal.
author: 0x893D2E776F21143354123241bC1DC237C47BC3fC
